eos.agent.firm
Class Firm

Object
  eos.agent.Agent
      eos.agent.firm.Firm
Direct Known Subclasses:
CFirm, ConsumerGoodFirm
public abstract class Firm
extends Agent

Parent class of all firms.

zhihongx
